definition: acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion

sentences.english: You can give a late-term abortion with just acupuncture.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过针灸来晚期流产。

sentences.english: The filiform needle can also be fitted out for traditional electric acupuncture therapy.
sentences.chinese: 也可配用毫针进行传统电针灸治疗。

sentences.english: In addition acupuncture and auriculotherapy also have better treatment effect to nocturnal make water.
sentences.chinese: 此外针灸和耳针疗法对夜尿也有较好治疗作用。

sentences.english: The acupunture had no effect at all in either group if the needles were not rotated.
sentences.chinese: 如果不经旋转，针灸在两组小鼠身上则完全无效。

sentences.english: Some studies have found that acupuncture effectively relieves menstrual cramps.
sentences.chinese: 有研究表明针灸可以有效的缓解经痛。

sentences.english: The analgesic effects of acupuncture are well-documented.
sentences.chinese: 针灸止痛的效果是举世公认的。

sentences.english: Many sections and chapters of acupuncture and moxibustion in The Yellow Emperor's Internal Classic contain a principle of pulse taking.
sentences.chinese: 《内经》的许多针灸篇章中都蕴藏着一个诊脉原则。

sentences.english: Acupuncture was developed in China around 4, 000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 针灸疗法自4000多年前的中国开始发展。

sentences.english: Acupuncture can relieve adverse reactions to radiotherapy and/or chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 针灸可以减轻癌症放疗和化疗后的不良反应。

sentences.english: Conclusion The combined therapy with acupuncture is an effective one for hysteric aphonia.
sentences.chinese: 结论针灸综合疗法是治疗癔病性失音的有效方法。

sentences.english: Acupuncture therapy needs to innovate and development.
sentences.chinese: 针灸学理论需要创新和发展。

sentences.english: Objective To further investigate the clinical efficacy of balance acupuncture for the treatment of shoulder periarthritis due to cervical spondylopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察平衡针灸治疗颈源性肩周炎的临床疗效。

sentences.english: This is the website of Traditional Chinese Medicine and Acupuncture Electronic Database.
sentences.chinese: 这是中草药和针灸电子数据库的网站。

sentences.english: Now He is the managing director of the Clinical Branch of China Acupuncture and Moxibustion Association.
sentences.chinese: 现任中国针灸学会临床分会常务理事。

sentences.english: Acupuncture is a centuries-old chinese method of healing.
sentences.chinese: 针灸是一个百年的中国法愈合。

sentences.english: The basis of acupuncture is the theory of meridians and acupoints.
sentences.chinese: 针灸的理论基础就是经络腧穴理论。

definition: cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
tui na (form of Chinese manual therapy)
suction cup (used in Chinese medicine to draw the blood and qi 氣|气)/detachable suction chimney to make a stove draw
to hit a pressure point (martial arts)/dim mak/see also 點脈|点脉[dian3 mai4]
Western medicine/a doctor trained in Western medicine
traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
